title: Try/Catch with Async/Await
description: Handle errors using try/catch in async functions

hints.content: Use try/catch to handle the potential error from JSON.parse(). Return the parsed result if successful, null if it fails.
In the try block, call JSON.parse(jsonString) and return the result. In the catch block, return null.
Use: `try { return JSON.parse(jsonString); } catch (error) { return null; }`

learningObjectives: Returning different values based on success/failure
